document: A MARKETING ANALYSIS MODEL APPLIED TO ROMAN CATHOLIC ELEMENTARY AND SECONDARY EDUCATION IN TOLEDO, OHIO by John Archie Thomas A dissertation submitted in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of Doctor of Philosophy (Education) in The University of Michigan 1971 Doctoral Committee: Professor Russell E. Wilson, Chairman Professor Frederick Bertolaet Professor Dan H. Cooper Professor J. B. Ritchie The Reverend Bernard Harrington, Assistant Superintendent of Schools, Archdiocese of Detroit Reproduced with permission of the copyright owner.
